casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Antonio D. Farinha (12956)

Dupont, C. J., and Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued November 7 decision released November 29, 1994 Michael R. Hasse, for the appellant (defendant). Lawrence J. Tytla, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was C. Robert Satti, Sr., state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
